ethereumsection.p: Link TL;DRs ELI5s from Twitter, Reddit, Telegram to relevant sites like ethereum.org. This way, we won't lose useful content, while retaining context of the original poster.

ethereumsection.h3: Improve open source projects as non-coder (zeig hier auch demand side "i want feedback on this very website you are browsing")
ethereumsection.p: Lower the hurdle to give feedback on projects. Any Metamask user can leave a simple note. And product teams can ask for feedback on their website, targeting only Kontext users.
Ask for similar projects while playing with new DEFI apps, or ask for tooling while scrolling through documentation. Or add context yourself.
Trust score. Investment ratings. Security ratings. Entertainment value. Service score. Rate anything. Help metamask to keep their phishing database up to date. And view your friends ratings.

ethereumsection.h3: Share your address book with friends
ethereumsection.p: Label addresses publicly, share them with your friends, or sell access. Send money to users via their github or twitter name. And crowdsource a database of malicious addresses to highlight on etherscan.
Experienced Ethereum commmunity members link content, creating context for the ones who just start out. Newbs upvote and mentors gain reputation - purely anonymous and onchain.

beyondsection.p: Exchange p2p recommendations: videos, music, restaurants, longread, movie. Add and receive content similar to the one you currently view.
Personalize websites. Follow lists like "darkmode anywhere" and edit the css of your favorite website.
